scripts.deploy-dev: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions --project dev
scripts.deploy-dev-beta: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions --project dev-beta
scripts.deploy-stage: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions --project stage
scripts.deploy-dev-dialogflow: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions:dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment --project dev
scripts.deploy-dev-beta-dialogflow: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions:dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment --project dev-beta
scripts.deploy-stage-dialogflow: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions:dialogflowFirebaseFulfillment --project stage
scripts.deploy-prod: node retrieveCoordinates && firebase deploy --only functions --project prod
